channel.title: CVE Feed for Hamid Alinia – idehweb -- Login with phone number
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hamid Alinia – idehweb -- Login with phone number

item.title: CVE-2024-37429|2024-07-22T20:27:54.576Z -- hamid%20alinia%20%E2%80%93%20idehweb -- login%20with%20phone%20number
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hamid Alinia – idehweb Login with phone number allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Login with phone number: from n/a through 1.7.35.

item.title: CVE-2024-32507|2024-06-04T17:51:41.338Z -- hamid%20alinia%20%E2%80%93%20idehweb -- login%20with%20phone%20number
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Hamid Alinia – idehweb Login with phone number allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Login with phone number: from n/a through 1.7.16.

item.title: CVE-2024-34371|2024-05-06T19:04:12.584Z -- hamid%20alinia%20%E2%80%93%20idehweb -- login%20with%20phone%20number
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Hamid Alinia – idehweb Login with phone number.This issue affects Login with phone number: from n/a through 1.7.18.
